en.title: Do you intend to ask the court to delay the divorce until it’s satisfied with your financial situation?
en.description: As your {{ divorceWho }} used separation as the reason for divorce, you can ask the court to consider what your financial position will be afterwards.
en.theCourtMayDelay: The court may then decide to delay the final stage of the divorce (the decree absolute) until it is satisfied with the future financial arrangements between you and your {{ divorceWho }}.
en.readMoreParagraph1: If you ask the court to do this, it won’t make the decree absolute unless it’s satisfied that your {{ divorceWho }} either:
en.readMoreParagraph2: has made or will make financial provision for you that is reasonable and fair or the best that they can do under the circumstances
en.readMoreParagraph3: shouldn’t have to provide for you financially
en.readMoreParagraph4: When making its decision the court will take into account both of your individual circumstances (for example your ages, health, conduct, and earning capacities) and your financial position should your {{ divorceWho }} die first.
en.readMoreParagraph5: The court may decide not to delay the divorce if there are circumstances under which it shouldn’t be delayed and the court is satisfied that your {{ divorceWho }} will make appropriate financial provision for you.
en.formB: You’ll need to submit another form (form B) after you’ve submitted this form - you’ll be given a link to it at the end of this form.

errors.required: Select if you want the court to consider your financial situation after the divorce

cy.title: A ydych yn bwriadu gofyn i’r llys ohirio’r ysgariad hyd nes y bydd yn fodlon â’ch sefyllfa ariannol?
cy.description: Gan fod eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi defnyddio gwahanu yn rheswm dros ysgaru, gallwch ofyn i’r llys ystyried eich sefyllfa ariannol ar ôl ysgaru.
cy.theCourtMayDelay: Yna gall y llys ystyried gohirio cam olaf yr ysgariad (y dyfarniad absoliwt) nes ei fod yn fodlon ar y trefniadau ariannol rhyngoch chi a’ch {{ divorceWho }}.
cy.readMoreParagraph1: Os byddwch yn gofyn i’r llys wneud hyn, ni fydd yn gwneud y dyfarniad absoliwt nes y bydd yn fodlon fod eich {{ divorceWho }} naill ai wedi:
cy.readMoreParagraph2: gwneud darpariaeth ariannol ichi neu y bydd yn gwneud darpariaeth ariannol ichi sy’n rhesymol ac yn deg neu’r ddarpariaeth orau o fewn ei (g)allu dan yr amgylchiadau
cy.readMoreParagraph3: na ddylai orfod gwneud darpariaeth ariannol ichi
cy.readMoreParagraph4: Wrth ddod i benderfyniad bydd y llys yn ystyried amgylchiadau unigol y ddau ohonoch (er enghraifft eich oed, eich iechyd, eich ymddygiad, a’ch gallu i ennill arian) a’ch sefyllfa ariannol pe bai eich {{ divorceWho }} yn marw gyntaf.
cy.readMoreParagraph5: Efallai y bydd y llys yn penderfynu peidio â gohirio’r ysgariad o dan amgylchiadau lle na ddylid ei ohirio a bod y llys yn fodlon y bydd eich {{ divorceWho }} yn gwneud darpariaeth ariannol addas ar eich cyfer.
cy.formB: Bydd angen ichi gyflwyno ffurflen arall (ffurflen B) ar ôl ichi gyflwyno’r ffurflen hon - bydd dolen i’r ffurflen honno ar ddiwedd y ffurflen hon.

errors.required: Dewiswch os ydych am i’r llys ystyried eich amgylchiadau ariannol ar ôl yr ysgariad
